_meta.description: CARC (Claim Adjustment Reason Codes) with resolution steps
_meta.note: Resolution steps based on real-world experience - contributions welcome

CO.name: Contractual Obligation
CO.description: Amount provider agreed to write off per contract

resolution_steps: Verify patient's deductible status
Bill patient for deductible amount
Confirm amount applied to deductible is accurate
Bill patient for coinsurance amount
Verify coinsurance percentage matches contract
Should have been collected at time of service
Bill patient if not collected

4.description: Procedure code inconsistent with modifier or required modifier missing
resolution_steps: Review modifier requirements for the procedure code
Check if modifier is in correct position (1st, 2nd, etc.)
Add missing modifier if appropriate
Remove inappropriate modifier if present
Resubmit corrected claim
common_fixes: Add modifier 25 to E/M billed with procedure
Add TC or 26 for split billing

5.description: Procedure code/bill type inconsistent with place of service
resolution_steps: Verify place of service code is correct
Check if procedure is payable at that location
Correct POS and resubmit

16.description: Claim/service lacks information needed for adjudication
resolution_steps: Check RARC for specific missing information
Review claim for missing fields
Add required information and resubmit
Check if original claim was paid
If truly duplicate, no action needed
If different service, add modifier 76 or 77 and resubmit
Verify patient eligibility on date of service
Bill correct payer if coverage changed
Bill patient if no coverage existed

29.description: Time limit for filing has expired
resolution_steps: Check timely filing limit for this payer
Gather proof of original timely submission
Appeal with clearinghouse transmission reports
Document any payer delays that caused late filing
29.prevention: Submit claims within 30-45 days of DOS

50.description: Non-covered service - not deemed medically necessary by payer
resolution_steps: Review diagnosis codes - use most specific ICD-10 available
Check LCD/NCD coverage criteria for this procedure
Add secondary diagnoses that support medical necessity
Gather clinical documentation supporting need
Submit appeal with letter of medical necessity
appeal_documentation: Letter from physician explaining why service was needed
Relevant clinical notes and test results
prevention_tips: Document medical necessity in clinical notes before service
50.note: CO group - cannot bill patient. Must appeal or write off.

resolution_steps: Verify service is covered under patient's benefit plan
Check if ABN/waiver was obtained
Appeal if service should be covered

97.description: Payment included in allowance for another service (bundled)
resolution_steps: Review CCI edits for code combination
Determine if services were truly distinct
If distinct, add modifier 59 or X-modifier and resubmit
If bundled correctly, no action - accept bundling
97.note: Modifier may not always override bundling - check payer rules

109.description: Claim not covered by this payer/contractor
resolution_steps: Verify payer/plan is correct
Check for COB - bill primary payer first
Resubmit to correct payer

151.description: Payment adjusted - information does not support frequency of services
resolution_steps: Check frequency limits for this code/payer
Gather documentation supporting medical necessity for frequency
Appeal with clinical justification
Check if service truly required prior auth
If auth was obtained, add auth number and resubmit
Request retroactive authorization if available
Appeal with documentation of emergent circumstances

204.description: Service/equipment/drug not covered under patient's benefit plan
resolution_steps: Verify patient's specific benefit coverage
Check for alternative covered codes
If ABN was obtained, bill patient
